Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 Planning a v1.4.4 release for next week, does this need to go in? Looks like ~ldesrosi is working on it.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: We can do this in v1.4.5 ... no need for this in v1.4.4 at this point

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: Cannot we make a copy of the object , update CKA_id with SKI value and delete Original copy ? What do you think ~mastersingh24 ?

Action.author: ldesrosi
Action.body: Unfortunately, not all HSM providers implement C_CopyObject. It is the case for the AWS CloudHSM. None of the methods that allows a copy or a modification after creation are implemented.

Action.author: ldesrosi
Action.body: ~denyeart Yes, I will submit a new PR before 05/12. Thanks

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Merged into release-1.4. Let's allow some more testing in release-1.4 and then consider what approach should be taken for v2.x.

Action.author: silveraid
Action.body: I am just wondering if you guys considered using the CKA_LABEL to identify objects instead of CKA_ID.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: The support has been in v1.4.x for a while now and it seems to work well for people. Luc mentioned he could port to main next, but we could use another volunteer to test using AWS CloudHSM.

Action.author: JIRAUSER19836
Action.body: Hi, is this issue still active ? I can see that https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/pull/2479 is merged already.
